snippet.title: Elden Ring Reforged - New Bosses Showcase
snippet.description:
Hey guys 👋 This is a showcase video of all the new bosses and mini-bosses that I found in the Elden Ring Reforged mod. I didn't try to No-Hit them, so it's "Yes Hit Fights" 😁 All these boss fights were interesting. Overall I definitely recommend trying this mod 👍
Thanks for watching! 
Consider subscribing to the channel if you enjoy my content.

Gameplay was recorded on ER Reforged mod v0.12.2B version.
New Somber Weapons Showcase - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KcMSNK3dC9s
New Smithing Weapons Showcase - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n5r0C0Ew6nQ
Also Check This - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=REz_bi6LwRE


ELDEN RING Reforged is an overhaul of ELDEN RING's balance and mechanics with the intent to create a more balanced experience with fair, but still challenging, combat. It is not about "easier" or "harder," but more interesting and balanced combat.

Elden Ring Reforged Mod - https://www.nexusmods.com/eldenring/mods/541


Timestamps:
00:00 Thief-Taker Acacio
01:34 Azash, Pride of the Redmanes
03:09 Grave Sentinel Wyngrant
05:15 Crucible Knight Hirnan
08:57 Nox Nightmaiden
11:14 Fellthorn Spirit
13:47 Hallowed Avatar
17:42 Fulminating Runebear
19:49 Alablaster Lord
21:39 Tree Sentinel










Elden Ring is an action role-playing game played in a third-person perspective with gameplay focusing on combat and exploration aswell as pvp and rpg elements; it features elements similar to those found in other games developed by FromSoftware, such as the Souls series, Bloodborne, Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice and other soulslike games. Director Hidetaka Miyazaki explained that players start with a linear opening but eventually progress to freely explore the Lands Between, including its six main areas, as well as castles, fortresses, and catacombs scattered throughout the open world map. And with a lore deeper than the abyss of hell aswell as ost better than any other. 


Elden Ring Reforged - New Bosses Showcase
#eldenring #eldenringgameplay
